import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import styles from './styles.module.scss' import clsx from 'clsx' function Header() { const [visiblePopup, setVisiblePopup] = React.useState(false); const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = React.useState(0); const langRef = React.useRef() console.log("Header -> langRef", langRef) const allLang = ['ru', 'kz'] const activeLang = allLang[activeItem] const toggleVisible = () => { setVisiblePopup(!visiblePopup) } const onSelectItem = id => { setActiveItem(id) setVisiblePopup(false) } return (
Туризм онлайн Главная Новости Публикации Вебинары Войти
{activeLang} {visiblePopup && (
    {allLang && allLang.map((name, index) => (
  • activeItem !== index ? onSelectItem(index) : ''} className={clsx(activeItem === index ? styles.active : '')} key={index}> {name}
    • )) }
)}
Регистрации
) } export default Header
